description: Number of n-node animals on b.c.c. lattice.
comments: Let kappa(z) be as defined on p. 488 of Baxter, Enting & Tsang. Define rho(x) = z * d/dz (log(kappa(z))). Then the series for rho(z) is z-5z^2+31z^3-209z^4+1476z^5-10739z^6+-... - _Steven Finch_, Jan 20 2002
references: R. J. Baxter, I. G. Enting and S. K. Tsang, Hard-square lattice gas, J. Stat. Phys. 22 (1980) 465-489
J.-G. Penaud, Arbres et Animaux. Ph.D. Dissertation, Université Bordeaux I, 1990.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: I. Dutour, Animaux dirigés et approximations de séries génératrices, Mémoire de DEA, 1992, Université Bordeaux I.
Index entries for sequences related to b.c.c. lattice
author: _Simon Plouffe_
